title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 575.19 - Liability of recording officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 575.19 - Liability of recording officer

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 1408
A recording officer, or any other person designated to act
as an agent, is not liable for any inaccuracy in the amount of tax collected so
long as the tax is computed and collected on the amount of consideration, or
the value of the interest conveyed, as stated on the return required to be
filed pursuant to section
575.14
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
575.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
